title: Ryuuganime JSON Schema for Anime Database, v.2.4-a
description:
Anime JSON Entry Validator in JSON Schema of Ryuuganime.
Performance issues or else may occurs on this Schema while it's on Beta version.

title.description: A serial title in multiple languages. Based on ICU locales

native.description: A serial title in native language. Including, but not limited to: Japanese, Chinese, and Korean

en_Latn.description: A serial title in romanizated form

ar_001.description: A serial title in Modern Standard Arabic

en_US.description: A serial title in American English

es_ES.description: A serial title in Spain Spanish

zh_Hans.description: A serial title in Simplified Chinese

zh_Hant.description: A serial title in Traditional Chinese

backdrop.description: A backdrop/background image URL of serial

visualKey.description: A visual key/poster image URL of serial

synopsis.description: A synopsis/plot of story of serial in several languages. Based on ICU locales

information.description: An advanced information about related serial

synonyms.description: Serial title synonyms in several languages. Based on ICU locales

en_US.description: Explains type of series in American English

id_ID.description: Explains type of series in Indonesian

en_US.description: Explains airing status of serial in American English

id_ID.description: Explains airing status of serial in Indonesian

serialTags.description: Tag(s) of the serial. Basically its more like specific genre

isNsfw.description: Mark the serial if not safe for work

adaptation.description: Mark the serial if it's adapted from different source or not

officialWebsite.description: Links to official website of current entry

promotionalVideos.description: List of promotional videos of current entry

producers.description: Producers that involved to current entry/project

updatedDate.description: Date and time of latest changes to JSON. Based on ISO 8601

signature.description: A virtual signature of entry contributor

sign.description: Unique random characters made by contributor
